about_the_game:
----- WELCOME TO ARGONISOS -----



THE GODDESS HERA
----------------------
eventually managed to kill Hercules! Now Zeus had to find a new hero to make them a demi-god so they can imprison Hera for good! Will you be the one?


Argonisos
-------------

*sample island


is a 617.76sq miles (1,600sq km) open-world map that is an actual replica map of Greece. Explore it alone or along with 9 other warriors! Survive in the wilderness and combat countless creatures. Explore, Fight, Gather Resources, Build your base to overcome everything and become Zeus' next Demi-god!


EXPERIENCE AN IMMERSIVE WORLD

*5/10 biomes displayed


in a fantasy-set massive map full of enemies to battle, resources to gather and mysteries to discover! 10 unique biomes scattered across the land waiting for you to explore them, until you are able to reach Olympos.


BUILD YOUR BASE
--------------------

*a Base we made ourselves after


using 250+ building pieces and create your unique architectural style! Don't forget to fortify your creations because the land of Argonisos is not without it's perils send from malevolent deities!


DO BATTLE
---------------

*enemies displayed here are before post-processing


with Mythical creatures based on Greek Mythology. Boars, Dryads, Gorgons, Minotaurs, Medusas, Harpies and many more have been send from Hera to end you! Kill 'em all to discover new materials, weapons and equipment. Find and kill in battle every biome's Boss to absorb some of their powers to make them yours to use your final fight against Hera!


SURVIVE
------------



by gathering resources to craft better weapons and equipment, or better foods to give you health and energy. Without food you are way weaker than with a full belly, so be sure to eat plenty and never forget to rest and take cover from the elements!


KEY FEATURES:
  • 617.76sq miles Open-World Greece replica map (using an automatic seed system, each world will be unique)
  • Day/Night cycle System
  • Dynamic Weather System (experience a challenging weather system)
  • Fog and Mist System
  • Dynamic and Volumetric Lighting providing beautiful scenery for unique screenshots
  • Multiple Character Creation System (create as many Greek warriors as you want)
  • Single-Player and Multi-player System (play the game with up to 10 players)
  • Modular Building System (build structures any way you like)
  • Character Customisation (create unique Greek warriors)
  • Multiple World Creation (create as many Worlds as you want)
  • Crafting System (craft weapons, tools and equipment to help you survive)
  • Cooking System (hunt, cook and eat to be strong)
  • 13 Skills to upgrade (sprinting, sneaking, axe-wielding, etc.)
  • Automatic Level-Up (the more you use a skill, the better you become at it)
  • Health and Stamina System
  • Sailing System (build a sailboat and travel the seas)
  • Save System (save whenever you want)
  • Auto-Save System (in case you forget to, we have your back by auto-saving every 60sec)
  • Cheat Sheet (All Cheats and Codes will be fully available to everyone)
  • Fighting System (Engage in epic battles with mobs, enemies and powerful Bosses)
  • Base Building System (build your own base and upgrade it to get awesome buffs)
  • Gathering System (collect stones, bones, pieces of wood, flowers, etc. from the ground)
  • Mining System (chop down trees, kill creatures, brake rocks and mineral masses, etc.)
  • Fast-Travel System (place rods in the ground and have the ability to fast-travel between them)
  • 10 Biomes - 10 Bosses
  • 45 weapons
  • 54 armor pieces
  • 12 shields
  • 12 arrow types
  • 8 handheld tools
  • 250+ building pieces
  • 83 furniture and decoration models
  • 10 equipment models
  • 34 minion enemies & wild animals
  • 92 materials to craft, build, cook and farm
  • 45 food recipies

Wishlist and don't miss out!
Geia sou!
